  stingtra i see your connection with shredder. I wis=

      Yanshosh@... wrote: 



      ::Shredder/Zardus::

   =
   Shredder follows the screams, flying toward Stingtra and Wrath. He looks=
 down 
      at the two, deciding who to fire at.

      Having made his de=
cision, he deactivates his jetpack, flipping in the air and 
      landing =
on his feet with two chainguns out. Without hesitation, he opens full 
    =
  fire on Wrath.
      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Flying toward =
the Alliance base with Oinker hopefully following him, Zardus' 
      inter=
nal computer beeps, then reports.

      "Audio bug has transmitted message=
."

      Zardus' evil face twists into a grin. "Excelent. Replay message."=


      Following an affirmative beep, Zardus' intternal comp replays the m=
essage.

      "At last!" DeathStorm's voice sounds in his head, "The Allia=
nce shall be 
      mine!"

      Zardus chuckles. So, the assassin has dec=
ided to try and take over. Very 
      well, a challenge is welcome.
      =
Zardus speeds up, heading toward the Alliance base in a much better mood.
